name: Ghost of Kyiv - fly shooter
description:
This game was created to support Ukraine in this difficult time.

The Ghost of Kyiv - is the nickname given to a supposed MiG-29 Fulcrum flying ace credited with shooting down six Russian planes over Kyiv during the Kyiv offensive on 24 February 2022. 

Many sources consider the Ghost of Kyiv to be an urban legend or war propaganda, and the pilots alleged existence has been credited as a major morale boost for the Ukrainian population to bolster optimism in spite of the Russian invasion. The claims are likely not a deliberate creation, with the stories being shared by regular Ukrainian people on social media before official Ukrainian media accounts alluded to the pilot in a regular update. The Ghost of Kyiv has come to be treated by some as a composite character metaphorically representing the actions of the entire Ukrainian air force.

 //Wikipedia

How to Play:
- Use WSDA for navigation
- Hold left mouse button to shoot
 -Click right mouse button to use rockets

Features:

- The battle for the great Dnipro river

- Use super abilities

- Infinity level 

- Destroy invaders in the sky

Glory to Ukraine!
